entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET August 2022 Updates #233
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2022-34716: .NET Information Disclosure Vulnerability #232

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SudoInstall-Package Microsoft.Extensions.Primitives -Version 6.0.0 #73660
  • VerificationException with reflection, static abstract interface methods, and generic constraints #73658
  • area-ILTools-coreclr ilasm.exe failing - Failed to add user string using DefineUserString, hr=0x80131198, data: 'presence' #73656
  • [NativeAOT] RhpCopyObjectContents may cause long GC suspension pauses. #73655
    8.0.0
  • Assert (g_gc_lowest_address <= address) && (address < g_gc_highest_address) File: /__w/1/s/src/coreclr/gc/gc.cpp Line: 3571 #73653
  • [wasm][debugger] Connection logic for Firefox tests needs improvement #73651
    8.0.0
  • Use CLOCK_MONOTONIC for mutex waiting on iOS/macOS #73650
    8.0.0
  • Test failure - `S.R.Tests.ControlledExecutionTests.CancelOnTimeout_ThrowFromFinally` on ``Libraries Test Run checked coreclr Linux arm64 Debug` #73647
  • `xunit.extensibility.execution 2.4.2-pre.22` - ` primary signature's signing certificate is not trusted by the trust provider.` #73646
  • ubsan finds null pointer dereference in legacy code computing the equivalent of offset #73644
  • stop runtime maestro from consuming dotnet/msquic #73645
  • React to ref escape changes in interpolated string handlers #73642
    7.0.0
  • String interpolation with invariant culture #73639
  • API Proposal: XmlResolver.NullResolver #73637
    7.0.0
  • API Proposal: Obsolete XmlSecureResolver #73636
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed '(arg.GetEarlyNode() == nullptr) != (arg.GetLateNode() == nullptr)' during 'Rationalize IR' #73634
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'm_comp->lvaGetDesc(m_srcLclNode)->IsAddressExposed()' during 'Optimize index checks' #73628
    7.0.0
  • [tvOS][iOS] System.Numerics.Tests.GetBitLengthTests.RunGetBitLengthTestsLarge - OutOfMemory #73623
  • Crash in System.Net.WebSockets.Client - Illegal memory access #73621
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Regression on 8/1/2022 6:03:22 PM #73630
  • From issue #65696. #73635
  • Assertion failed in loader: , condition `<disabled>' not met #73617
    7.0.0
  • JIT incorrectly reorders constrained call 'this' indirections with other arguments #73615
    8.0.0
  • Sporadic OpenSSL decryption fails for HttpClient responses #73610
    8.0.0
  • [blazor] canot debug blazor client when using custom domain name / "Unbound breakpoint" #73614
  • API Proposal: Unsafe.IsNullRef(ref readonly) #73608
  • ParallelLoopState.ShouldExitCurrentIteration does not match true later than true is assigned #73607
  • Constrained execution behavior change in .net7 preview 6 #73606
    7.0.0
  • Expose System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86.Avx512F #73604
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Test failure JIT/HardwareIntrinsics/X86/Sse2/Sse2_ro/Sse2_ro.sh #59447
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Random test failure due to a possible race in startup #73528
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger][tests] Possible race condition seen in `DebuggerTests.BreakpointTests.JSConditionalBreakpoint` #69144
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] HotReload test failures #72946
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] NRE in `DebuggerTests.BreakpointTests.DebugHotReloadMethodUnchangedUsingSDB` #66024
    7.0.0
  • Assert in mini-codegen.c on Mono x86 #60347
    8.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection internal constructor #73652
  • Parsing format string precision intends to validate for overflow but the check does not work #67891
    7.0.0
  • Test failure GC\\LargeMemory\\API\\gc\\keepalive\\keepalive.cmd #71624
    7.0.0
  • System.IO.Pipes.Tests Fails on iOS/tvOS #51335
    7.0.0
  • System.IO.Tests fails on iOS/tvOS #51390
    Future
  • Assert failure: m_alignpad == 0 in libraries tests #70231
    7.0.0
  • Revise pthread_condattr_setclock on Android #58737
    7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Stress QUIC mangled data #72739
    7.0.0
  • Mobile developers will experience improved app startup time when targeting .NET 6 #48761
    7.0.0
  • [MONO][WASM] Microbenchmark fails with wasm-aot with 'Invalid Cast (Producer: 'LLVM11.1.0' Reader: 'LLVM 13.0.0git')' error #58387
    7.0.0
  • Several Arm64 regressions (benchmarks turned bimodal) #70024
    7.0.0
  • Resolve StaticCS.0.1.0 source-build prebuilt #73025
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed '((node->OperGet() == GT_CALL) && (def->OperIsStore() || def->OperIs(GT_PUTARG_STK, GT_NOP, GT_ARGPLACE))) || ((node->OperGet() == GT_JTRUE) && (def->TypeGet() == TYP_VOID) && ((def->gtFlags & GTF_SET_FLAGS) != 0))' during 'Rationalize IR' #64297
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!"Instruction cannot be encoded: IF_LS_2B"' during 'Generate code' #68536
    7.0.0
  • GC/API/GC/GetGCMemoryInfo/GetGCMemoryInfo.sh test failing intermittently on CoreCLR Linux ARM32 #73247
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: InitialCapacity for AsnWriter #69573
    8.0.0
  • [WINARM][Regression] Fail to run the command – & “C:\Program Files (x86)\dotnet\dotnet.exe" test --framework net7.0 --diag:loga.txt #71098
    7.0.0
  • Test failure Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_42732/test42732/test42732.sh #71755
    7.0.0
  • UriBuilder creates Uri with wrong scheme if scheme has only one letter #73459
    7.0.0
  • MultipleOperationsOverSingleHandle_CompletedWorkItemCountTest frequent failures #49700
    7.0.0
  • [MONO][Interp] JIT/CodeGenBringUpTests/Localloc_* failed with interpreter #54359
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\opt\\virtualstubdispatch\\bigvtbl\\bigvtbl_cs_d\\bigvtbl_cs_d.cmd #69661
    7.0.0
  • Reconsider naming of ObsoletedInOSPlatformAttribute #72970
    7.0.0
  • System.Reflection.Metadata doesn't handle generic attributes #58073
    7.0.0
  • Hundreds of exceptions in Debug output when reloading a Asp.Net Core hosted Web Assembly app #53843
    7.0.0
  • `dotnet-pgo create-mibc` emits warnings for being unable to find dynamic assemblies #68000
    7.0.0
  • Mono jit/hardwareintrinsics/x86/x86base/pause tests failing #61693
    7.0.0
  • How to request administrator permissions at runtime #73618
  • [.NET6] Runtime should validate managed assembly's target architecture before loading it #48165
    8.0.0
  • AndroidManifest can not be set to an absolute path #73311
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.ActivatorUtilitiesBenchmark #72474
    7.0.0
  • [WASM] Browser tab crashes when dotnet-crypto-worker.js fails to connect to WebSocket #72941
    7.0.0
  • [jitstress] System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Tests.Vectors.Vector64Tests.Vector64Int64SumTest fails frequently on win-x86 #73559
    7.0.0
  • WebSockets over HTTP/1.1 with HttpClient fails #72476
    7.0.0
  • Consider adding JsonConverter for BinaryData that converts to Base64 string #70267
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.Encodings.Web.Tests.Perf_Encoders #59997
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json work planned for .NET 7 #63762
    7.0.0
  • System.IO work planned for .NET 7 #64596
    7.0.0
  • Remove `!` from `Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing` #58211
    7.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Process work planned for .NET 7 #64600
    7.0.0
  • System.IO.Compression work planned for .NET 7 #62658
    7.0.0
  • System.Console work planned for .NET 7 #64487
    7.0.0
  • System.Net.Sockets.SocketException (10060): A connection attempt failed because the connected party did not properly respond after a period of time, #73561
  • [wasm][debugger] Differentiate between virtual and new virtual in derived members on GetProperties #69788
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: IRandom interface (which Random and RandomNumberGenerator implement) #73567
  • Debugger c# net 7 not native file request broken AND Breakpoint error #73591
    8.0.0
  • crossgen2 --instruction-set has no apparent effect on .NET 6 class library #63241
    7.0.0
  • Robust POSIX mutexes unavailable on NetBSD #5902
    Future
  • Unable to use Libraries.sln in VS #69584
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Handle the case when pid replacement is not needed #73664
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Remove non-determinism from R2R field access #73663
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [wasm] Misc fixes #73662
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Enable inlining P/Invokes into try blocks with no catch or filter clauses V2 #73661
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Initialize main thread to MTA by default in NativeAOT #73659
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • To keep ubsan happy, Use offsetof() rather than legacy equivalent #73657
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix #70391 #73654
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • ILASM - Roundtrip fix for 'poison' and 'hugeSimpleExpr1' #73648
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Fix BigInteger.Parse returning incorrect values for exponents above 1000 #73643
    area-System.Numerics
  • Update dotnet/msquic ref to release/7.0 #73641
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use JitStdOutFile for .dasm file creation #73638
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make OCSP Stapling tests more reliable and more diagnosable #73632
    area-System.Net.Security, test-enhancement, 7.0.0
  • Ensure BitIncrement/BitDecrement for Half works correctly #73631
    area-System.Numerics
  • [wasm] Test crypto fix #73629
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Use SSL_ctrl instead of SSL_CTX_ctrl to enable client OCSP stapling #73627
    area-System.Net.Security, 7.0.0
  • Initialize variable prior to pedantic use. Caught by ubsan on a bool. #73626
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [armel/Tizen] Skip host from cross-build #73625
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update Maui builds to use dotnet rc1 and new dotnet version flow #73624
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix JSON source gen to work with public context and public types with internal properties #73622
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Gradual decommit in wks #73620
    area-GC-coreclr
  • #55071 enable dynamic test #73619
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • [Ppc64le] Added memory patch thunking for function calls #73616
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution, arch-ppc64le
  • Get rid of more .NET Nativisms #73612
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix preinit of types placing the same value in two fields #73605
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix ABI for Int128 #73601
    area-Interop-coreclr

Merged

  • [interp] bounds check fallthru in conditional branches #73580
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [host] Copy hostfxr and hostpolicy for Mono also, if !mobile #73633
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • fix credential caching on macOS #73577
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix some racy tests #73524
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #73640
    area-System.Security
  • Fix overflow check for parsing format strings #72647
    area-System.Numerics, breaking-change
  • Fix interleaved heap RW commit failure handling #73566
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • PlatformNotSupportedException for UNIX domain sockets on iOS/tvOS #73374
  • Add lowering support for conditional nodes #71705
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • CI: Add support in yml for detecting darc dependency changes in `eng/Version.Details.xml` #73435
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Reset current_no_gc_region_info after leaving no gc region implicitly #73602
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [Android] Remove BROKEN_CLOCK_SOURCE define on Android #73489
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [QUIC] Copy managed memory instead of pinning #72746
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Revert "Disable GetGCMemoryInfo on arm (#73477)" #73595
  • Implement initial capacity for AsnWriter #73535
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • [wasm] asset loading for workers #73484
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Condition ExternalConsoleManipulation_RegistrationRemoved_UnregisterSucceeds on RemoteExecutor.IsSupported #73603
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [mono][interp] Return null for localloc with len 0 #73174
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Rename ObsoletedInOSPlatform attribute #73600
    area-Meta
  • Generic attributes handling in CustomAttributeDecoder #72561
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, 7.0.0
  • Mark phase prefetching. #73375
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [PERF] Fix "x$PERF_PREREQS_INSTALLED was unexpected at this time" Error for Microbenchmarks #73584
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Disable useless warnings #73598
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] Enable X86Base.Pause test only when LLVM is enabled #73318
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • JIT: Fix liveness for dependently promoted TYP_LONGs on x86 #73562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add custom JsonConverter for BinaryData that converts to Base64 string #73448
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm-ep] Remove old sample and JS-based diagnostics #73586
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono
  • Set up `HttpClient` for `ClientWebSocket.ConnectAsync` #73387
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Succeed rather than skip JSON tests #73560
    area-System.Text.Json
  • More precise writebarrier for regions #67389
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Avoid additional Pipes msbuild invocation and clean-up project #73588
    area-Infrastructure
  • Delete some .NET Nativisms #73553
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Detect `new` keyword in derived members on GetProperties #73230
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Delete the "Generating compatible code" message #73554
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix ASAN mismatch #73549
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update PipeReader.ReadAtLeastAsync doc with AdvanceTo interaction #73478
    area-System.IO.Pipelines

Updated

  • Clean up AOT publish process #73416
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Support TraceSource to be initialized from the app.config file #73087
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Log as warning in interop generator when method signature is not supported #71477
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 7.0.0
  • Support managed debugging when CET is enabled #73572
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • fix handling of client cert on macOS #73574
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x
  • COSE: Add documentation and exception correction #73394
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Ldap search crashes on Linux when timeout specified #72676
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Adding cultureName to GeneratedRegexAttribute #73490
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Bracketed paste support #73257
    area-System.Console, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] crypto deadlock fix #73537
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Simplify platform macro definitions in PAL #73530
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix up doc comments #73597
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [MONO] Move marshal-ilgen into a component #71203
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Breakpoint set in a invalid line, set it to the next available line #73189
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [debugger] First draft of managed debugger on wasi #67272
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Add Directory.CreateTempSubdirectory #73408
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation
  • port SpanHelpers.IndexOfAny(ref byte, byte, byte, int) to Vector128/256 #73556
    area-System.Memory
  • [Android] Enable Dop_WorkersCreatedRespectingLimitAndTaskScheduler_Sync test #73486
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • [wasm] SIMD support improvements #73289
  • Enable JitDisasm in Release #73365
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [Android] Enable ThreadPoolCanPickUpOneOrMoreWorkItemsWhenThreadIsAvailable test #73487
    area-System.Threading
  • [RateLimiting] Add statistics API #72306
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Android] gRPC client tests #73060
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0] JIT: Avoid removing multi-use boxes #73014
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.9
  • Update MsQuic and use ConnectionCloseStatus in StreamShutdown #73563
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • PGO: Add new tiers #70941
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove redundant trimmer warning suppressions #73238
    linkable-framework
  • Port Windows/MSDTC distributed transactions support #72051
    area-System.Transactions
  • [wasm] Trigger all the AOT library tests when relevant paths have #73425
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][interp] Throw invalid program if stack state is invalid #73215
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm] Unmanaged structs are considered blittable if module has `DisableRuntimeMarshallingAttribute` #73310
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Update javascript API usage in samples and tests #73367
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Respect the Keep-Alive response header on HTTP/1.1 as well #73585
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Add CancellationToken-accepting overloads for SendPingAsync #72338
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] box+callvirt optimization #73456
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Added snake and kebab naming policies to JSON serializer #69613
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • X509Certificates.Tests: make tests pass when rsa+sha1 signing is not supported. #70821
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Introduce a default synchronization context for wasm #72652
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Fix SerialPort memory leak when requests time out and no data is received #68014
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Expand NativeAOT testing platforms #73546
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add extra NativeAOT test legs #73547
  • Fix issue#37970 #73552
    area-Serialization
  • [NativeAot] Triage another 14 libs tests #73442
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Add method parameter names to stack trace if available #73578
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add logging callback to DAC EnumMemoryRegion API #73599
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add local build for System.Globalization shim #72896
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Cleanup to lsra inspired by #73424 #73589
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • DCS alignment to 4.8 with schema support #71752
    area-Serialization, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • fix a couple issues with Microsoft.XmlSerailizer.Generator #73550
    area-Serialization

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Prefer to use project templates created in previous .NET versions #27065
  • Missing Linux `TargetFrameworkMoniker` #27061
  • dotnet build parameters (-p) don't work when joined by semicolon (;) in dotnet 6.0.400 #27059
  • Multi-version dotnet tool installed #27050
  • Description of `dotnet tool update` is "Update a global tool." even though it supports local tools #27036
  • 'dotnet new list' crashes for x64 SDK installed on Windows ARM64 #27032
    7.0.1xx

Closed

  • Hot reload erases captured local variables in async function #26803
  • dotnet build -r crashes with exception #23510
    7.0.1xx
  • Building net*-android apps always restore Microsoft.NETCore.App.Host.linux #25679
    Discussion
  • Opt out of sending telemetry data by default for non-Microsoft builds #24474
    7.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix for --print-download-link only #27064
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #27062
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Handle _GlobalPropertiesToRemoveFromProjectReferences in the SDK #27057
    Area-AspNetCore, 7.0.1xx
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.3xx #27054
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1933212 #27043
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [dotnet new] telemetry for MSBuild evaluation #27042
    Area-Infrastructure
  • `dotnet-new`: dotnet post-actions are moved to `dotnet` project #27039
  • Fix typo in TransformWebConfig.cs #27034
  • Update the rids in the test projects #27033
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix exception message when using an argument without a required value. #26994
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #27055
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #27053
    Area-Infrastructure
  • For build-from-source builds of .NET, opt-out of Microsoft telemetry #25935
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix job OneLocBuild is added duplicately by template engine job #27035
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Get PublishRelease and PackRelease working in .*proj #26808
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix print download link bug #27011
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add optional logging to MSBuild SDK Resolver #26904
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #26991
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support left and right names for assembly set #27024
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Removing default ProduceReferenceAssembly value for F# #26306
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Removed own implementation of Reporter in `TemplateEngine.Cli` #27021
    Area-Infrastructure
  • add rule for detecting attribute differences #26891
    Area-ApiCompat

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-09
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Decorator pattern for functions in .NET #6358
  • Proposal: Semi-Auto-Properties; `field` keyword #140
    Working Set

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update method-arguments-must-match rule to limit assignment to ref struct types #6357
  • Fix a typo in ToArray method call. #6356

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hot reload erases captured local variables in async function #63294
    17.4
  • Intermediate Generator outputs #63291
    C# 12.0
  • Prevent analyzer/generator authors from using banned APIs #63290
    17.4
  • InvalidOperationException thrown by AbstractMoveStaticMembersRefactoringProvider #63287
  • DocumentEditor.AddAttribute() ignores generic parameters #63281
  • Generate new type dialog from struct interface list as generic type parameter only allows generating interfaces #63280
    Backlog
  • Incomplete automatic constructor generation for derived class #63273
    Backlog

Closed

  • Inconsistency in allowed and forbidden operations using tuple syntax when System.ValueTuple is not defined #63278
  • Unexpected escape analysis behavior for interpolated string with variable of local scope #63262
    17.4
  • Binder cycle leads to `NullReferenceException` #63140
    17.4
  • Missing IConstructorBodyOperation for types with PrimaryConstructor #58741
    17.4
  • stackalloc should be disallowed for structs with ref fields #63104
    17.4
  • Code CleanUp 'make field readonly, add 'readonly' when only written by for-loop #59720
    Backlog
  • Directory separator does not work for .editorconfig #62501
  • SimplifyTypeNamesDiagnosticAnalyzerBase should sub-type AbstractBuiltInCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer #62639
    Backlog
  • Semantic Snippets - Completion list filtering #63211
    17.4 P2
  • Auto-default structs cause runtime exceptions in explicit constructors when a ref field is not initialized #63018
    17.4
  • Additional tab white space on XML comment leading trivia if Attribute is added prior #63227
    Backlog
  • Duplicate analyzer diagnostics from CompilationWithAnalyzers #63205
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-32808.858 #63272
  • Report error if ScopedRefAttribute is used directly in source #62124
    17.4
  • [API Proposal]: ModuleInitializerAttribute for VB.NET #62625

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • AdditionalProbingPaths are not honored by ASP.NET Core #43176
  • Net 6 Blazor server application::Failed to start the transport 'WebSockets': Error: WebSocket failed to connect. The connection could not be found on the server, either the endpoint may not be a SignalR endpoint, the connection ID is not present on the server, or there is a proxy blocking WebSockets. If you have multiple servers check that sticky sessions are enabled. #43175
  • WebTransport streams may arrive out of order #43171
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2022-34716: .NET Information Disclosure Vulnerability #43166
    Discussions
  • WFP blazor Support MVVM in future release? #43163
  • IIS Applications hosting (in site-folder) is not working for Blazor Server deployment #43161
  • ControllerBase.Problem does not support configuring Extensions #43159
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Blazor] Isolated css: generated attribute placement #43157
    Backlog
  • OIDC Implicit Flow "id_token" Through Google #43156
    .NET 8 Planning
  • System.NullReferenceException at Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.DefaultHttpRequest.get_Cookies() #43155

Closed

  • Change Kestrel's HTTPS endpoint defaults to improve developer experience #42016
    7.0-rc1
  • DistributedSession always loads session in CommitAsync even when session is not modified #42009
    7.0-rc1
  • Request.HttpContext.Connection.RemoteIpAddress.AddressFamily always returns InterNetworkV6 for both iPv4 and IPv6 #43165
  • [Blazor][wasm] Authorization to SignalR hub with Authorize attribute #43130
  • Fixer/Analyzer: Remove UseEndpoints() and hoist route registrations top level to WebApplication #35759
    .NET 7 Planning
  • OnParameterSetAsync is triggered when using a CascadingParameter and NavigationManager #33785
    Discussions
  • IIS Applications hosting (in site-folder) is not working for Blazor Server deployment #43160

PullRequests

Created

  • Add comment about QueryString in more places #43179
    area-runtime
  • Accessibility focus fixes #43177
    area-mvc
  • Update baseline, merge from internal #43173
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.36
  • Consolidate error pages used by ANCM and improve link #43170
    area-runtime
  • Delete StartupExceptionHandler #43153
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Update downlevel SiteExtension versions #43172
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1
  • Fix some Kestrel test indenting #43164
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #43168
    tell-mode, 6.0.9
  • Remove IsAvailable check on CommitAsync. #43059
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #43169
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.29
  • Register authz middleware where services not added #43167
    area-mvc, 7.0-rc1
  • [6.0] macOS dev-certs - Handle keychain paths with spaces #43148
    Servicing-approved, area-commandlinetools, feature-devcerts, 6.0.9
  • Add analyzer to suggest top level route registration #42937
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1
  • Fix route handler analyzer test culture warnings #43107
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc1
  • Obsolete LeakTrackingObjectPool and LeakTrackingObjectPoolProvider #43106
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1

Updated

  • Add FileDownloader service for Blazor apps #43076
    area-blazor, 7.0-rc1
  • Sync output cache with API review #43121
    area-runtime
  • Add Web Application Builder analyzers/fixers and tests #42724
    area-web-frameworks
  • Add more info to UnrecognizedMediaType #43100
    area-runtime
  • Fix UsePathBase with WAB #42876
    area-runtime
  • Kestrel: Support full cert chain #41944
    area-runtime
  • Updating HttpMethodMetadata based on ICorsMetadata #43077
    area-web-frameworks
  • RateLimitingMiddleware updates #43053
    area-runtime, blog-candidate
  • Update SDK #43028
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Dynamic authentication requests #42692
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm-auth
  • [SignalR] [.NET Client] Retry HTTP request on auth failure #42671
    area-signalr
  • Add option to not cache assembly references in runtime razor compilation #41086
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Add overload with `AuthenticationProperties` to `SignInManager.ExternalLoginSignInAsync` #43132
    area-identity, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-09
entry.content:

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-09
